entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`mId` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `uuid` TEXT, `mSize` INTEGER NOT NULL, `mAlpha` INTEGER NOT NULL, `mStyle` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_Widget_mId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Widget_mId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`mId`)

indices.name: index_Widget_uuid
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Widget_uuid` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`uuid`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
